segments.text: I went to Jessie's birthday party yesterday . It was very good .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I didn't know about it . What did you do ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We ate a lot of things . We played games and gave gifts to Jessie . We had a lot of fun .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My birthday comes next month . I want to hold a birthday party , too .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I hope I can go to your party .
segments.speaker: S2
